greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period 2: repeat 2, -1.
comment: Binomial transform of 2 followed by a signed version of A007283; also binomial transform of a signed version of A042950.
Second binomial transform of a signed version of A007051 without initial term 1.
Inverse binomial transform of 2 followed by A000079.
A028242 without first two terms gives partial sums.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1).
mathematica: Rest@ CoefficientList[Series[x (2 - x)/((1 - x) (1 + x)), {x, 0, 120}], x] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jul 19 2016 *)
program: [ n eq 1 select 2 else -Self(n-1)+1: n in [1..84] ];
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Nov 23 2009
ext: G.f. adapted to the offset by _Bruno Berselli_, Apr 01 2011
